00036 #ifndef PACC_Threading_Semaphore_hpp_
00037 #define PACC_Threading_Semaphore_hpp_
00038 
00039 #include "PACC/Threading/Mutex.hpp"
00040 #include "PACC/Threading/Condition.hpp"
00041 
00042 namespace PACC { 
00043     
00044     namespace Threading {
00045         
00054         class Semaphore : public Condition {
00055             public:
00057             Semaphore(unsigned int inCount=0) : mCount(inCount), mWaiters(0) {}
00058             
00060             int getCount(void) const {return mCount;}
00061             void post(bool inLock=true);
00063             void setCount(unsigned int inCount) {mCount = inCount;}
00064             bool tryWait(bool inLock=true);
00065             bool wait(double inMaxTime=0, bool inLock=true);
00066             
00067             protected:
00068             unsigned int mCount; 
00069             unsigned int mWaiters; 
00070         };
00071         
00072     } // end of Threading namespace
00073     
00074 } // end of PACC namespace
00075
